title: Certified Pre-Owned Devices
heroDescription: Evergreen Wireless redefines value in the Certified Pre-Owned (CPO) industry—delivering top-tier devices at competitive prices, all backed by a standard two-year warranty for peace of mind.
valueLead: Every Evergreen Wireless CPO device comes bundled with premium accessories at no extra cost, making it a complete out-of-the-box solution.
valueFooter: Experience quality, reliability, and unbeatable value—only with Evergreen Wireless.
warrantyDescription: In the very unlikely event that your Evergreen Wireless CPO device requires repair during the warranty period, we will send you a replacement device of the same or better model. You then have 30 days to migrate your data and return the original unit—simple and worry-free.
refurbDescription: Evergreen Wireless utilizes certified Device Repair Technicians to replace defective parts and restore devices back to like-new condition through a multi-step process:
gradingDescription: Evergreen Wireless uses industry-standard grading for all CPO devices, ensuring compliance, transparency, and a predictable user experience every time.
